content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[DimBattalion] (
      battalion_id INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL
    , battalion_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL
    , battalion_name VARCHAR(100) NULL
    , battalion_city_id_fk INT NOT NULL DEFAULT(1)
    , battalion_amount_of_members INT DEFAULT(5)
    , is_active BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT(1)
    , deactivation_date DATETIME NULL
    , deactivation_reason VARCHAR(200) NULL
)

CREATE TABLE dbo.DimAction (
      action_id INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL
    , action_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
    , action_description VARCHAR(500) NULL
    , is_active BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT(1)
    , deactivation_date DATETIME NULL
    , deactivation_reason VARCHAR(200) NULL
)

CREATE TABLE dbo.DimSituation (
      situation_id INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL
    , situation_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
    , situation_description VARCHAR(500) NULL
    , is_active BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT(1)
    , deactivation_date DATETIME NULL
    , deactivation_reason VARCHAR(200) NULL
)


CREATE TABLE dbo.DimPropertyUse (
      property_use_id INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL
    , property_use_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
    , property_use_description VARCHAR(500) NULL
    , is_active BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT(1)
    , deactivation_date DATETIME NULL
    , deactivation_reason VARCHAR(200) NULL
)

CREATE TABLE dbo.DimAreaOfFireOrigin (
      area_id INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL
    , area_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
    , area_description VARCHAR(500) NULL
    , is_active BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT(1)
    , deactivation_date DATETIME NULL
    , deactivation_reason VARCHAR(200) NULL
)


CREATE TABLE dbo.DimDistrict (
      district_id INT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL
    , district_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
    , district_city_id_fk INT NOT NULL DEFAULT(1)
    , district_location_latitude DECIMAL(10,2) NULL
    , district_location_longitude DECIMAL(10,2) NULL
    , is_active BIT NOT NULL DEFAULT(1)
    , deactivation_date DATETIME NULL
    , deactivation_reason VARCHAR(200) NULL
)
